function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of SAR-CoV-2 in public spaces due to relaxation of restrictions","Impact":"Increase in COVID-19 cases and potential overwhelming of healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Enforcement of social distancing measures, mandatory mask-wearing, and regular disinfection of public spaces","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, crowd monitoring systems, UV-C disinfection technology","People":"General public, healthcare workers, essential service providers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, facility managers"},{"Description":"Long-term transformation of social interactions in public spaces","Impact":"Loss of vibrant social dynamics, decline in community engagement, and potential mental health implications","Mitigation":"Incorporation of design elements that promote safe social interaction, community engagement programs, and mental health support services","Technologies":"Virtual reality technology for social engagement, interactive public space design, mental health mobile applications","People":"City-dwellers, community members, mental health professionals","Owner":"Urban planners, designers, community organizations"},{"Description":"Future uncertainty and fear regarding public space use","Impact":"Reduced public engagement, cautious participation in public activities, and economic downturn for businesses reliant on public spaces","Mitigation":"Transparent communication of public health measures, promotion of safe public space practices, and financial support for affected businesses","Technologies":"Digital communication platforms, public health information apps, economic stimulus packages","People":"Local businesses, public space users, policymakers","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities, economic development agencies"}]}
